name: SendEstimateEmail
description:
Send an email estimate to a customer.

Use this tool to email an estimate to a customer. If no specific content is provided, the default email content will be used.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization. This ID is required to send an estimate email.

parameters.name: estimate_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the estimate to be emailed.

parameters.name: email_attachments
parameters.description: Files to be attached to the email estimate. Provide file paths or URLs.

value_schema.description: Files to be attached to the email

parameters.name: email_content
parameters.description: JSON string including email details like sender, recipients, subject, body, and document IDs.

send_from_org_email_id.description: Boolean to trigger the email from the organization's email address

to_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients.

cc_mail_ids.description: Array of email address of the recipients to be cced.

subject.description: Subject of an email has to be sent.

body.description: Body of an email has to be sent.

mail_documents.description: Array of Documents ids, which is attached into email
